title: Lucy Wainwright Roche on Parenthood
itunes:title: Lucy Wainwright Roche on Parenthood
description:
Lucy met Chuck when she co-starred on the Stuff You Should Know TV show as JERI. But her day job is singer/songwriter, and she has one of the prettiest voices you'll ever hear. Daughter to Loudon Wainright and Suzzy Roche, sister to Martha and Rufus, listen in as they talk about old times, their pets, NYC and Lucy's childhood, and her movie crush, Ron Howard's Parenthood. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
